english.segment1: Dance if you're wounded. Dance if you're torn into. Dance broken open. Dance with nothing to lose
english.segment2: Dance when you're wounded. Dance when you're torn into. Dance broken open. Dance with nothing to lose
english.segment3: (Oh!) Perfectly free. (Oh!) Dance if you wanna be. (Oh!) Perfectly free. (Oh!) Dance if you wanna be
english.segment4: Change the world. Change your soul. Fill it up. Here we go. Here we go
english.segment5: Oh His is a story that saves. Majestic feel. Feel it at a steady pace
